attributes.action: Let children who are homeschooled get a job at 15.
attributes.additional_details: Any kid who is homeschooled can do their homeschooling on their own time meaning they get a-lot of free time. Being able to get a part time job whilst homeschooled can be rewarding and a blessing. It may also help families with money struggles. Kids who are in HS already struggle with getting jobs when they're 16  as they have no qualifications or experience, make it easier for them by giving them time to gain experience with a part time at 16, or even create government jobs such as cleaning streets ect.
attributes.background: Children who are aged 15 and are homeschooled should be able to get a job.

rejection.details: Children can work part-time from the age of 14. In some local council areas, children can work part-time from the age of 13.
